name: Solarpunk 3077
description:
A brand new shooter for the Game Boy color!

You canget a free copy of this demo's ROM if you purchase the original soundtrack composed by Night Runner here.

It is required to play it using a controller or a computer keyboard. Touchscreen controls are allowed but not recommended for playing this demo.

In the Year 3077, civilization survived a climate catastrophe by living in a controlled city-state called Solaris.

 The city and its surroundings live in harmony with nature, although under constant threat by the malicious Gray Goo, a gigantic mass of nanomachines that multiply by eating everything in their way.

Trixy, a cadet of an elite group of pilots called the Sentinels, will keep Solaris and the planet safe from the Gray Goo!

Developed by Tabique Malévolo

Music composed by Night Runner

Powered by GB Studio
